text: 1:13-14 Jon 21:18-19; 2 Korin 5:1; 2 Timoti 4:6; 2 Pita 3:1Kɨ fo, dughiar bar otevim, kɨ nguazir kamɨn itir mɨkarzim suevkɨnigham. En Ekiam Krais Iesus kamaghɨn na mɨkemegha gɨfa. Kamaghɨn dughiar kɨ inivafɨzir kamɨn aven ikiavɨra itim, kɨ nɨghnɨzima a dera, kɨ ua bizir kaba bagh ia mɨkɨmtɨma, ia ua dagh nɨghnɨghvɨra ikiam.
